content.body: As discussed in the plenary last week, I've put up a PR against proposal-upsert to take over as champion (https://github.com/tc39/proposal-upsert/pull/58) I'm not sure exactly who to ask for review, suggestions (and/or reviews) welcome :)

periodic reminder to Stage 0/1 proposal champions: please do not name your proposal after a specific solution/API, name it after the problem space https://github.com/tc39/proposal-upsert/pull/58/files#r1804884820
* periodic reminder to Stage 0/1 proposal champions: please do not name your proposal after a specific solution/API, name it after the problem space
